mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl(no, orderno, company, serial, orderdate, enddate, fabric, workwidth, workweight, price, color, orderlength, colorbt, etc) values(seq_order.nextval, #{orderno}, #{company}, #{serial}, #{orderdate}, #{enddate}, #{fabric}, #{workwidth}, #{workweight}, #{price}, #{color}, #{orderlength}, #{colorbt}, #{etc} )
